CWEs: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
description: The function is vulnerable to NoSQL Injection. The 'filter' parameter is directly used in the 'find' function without any sanitization or parameterization. An attacker can inject malicious code as part of the 'filter' parameter to manipulate the query, leading to unauthorized data access or data manipulation.
